name: StoreDevLabs
description: A website and personally owned company that offers e-commerce store web development services. Worked with different brands to provide their desired shopping experience. The landing page was created with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

name: Exoticcao Webpage
description: An e-commerce store for chocolate products. Created with Next.js, Tailwind CSS and using the Shopify GraphQL Storefront and Admin API's to leverage Shopify's functionality.

name: Bodega Murga
description: A website for a Peruvian organic wine store. Created with Shopify Liquid using a base free theme as a template, adding custom Liquid code (Javascript, HTML, CSS & JSON metadata)

name: Kuehne+Nagel Internship Project
description: An asset management platform where empoyee information can be managed. Created with React and Bootstrap.

name: Uniply Landing Page
description: A landing page for a startup that aims to unify the process of applying for a home loan. Created with Next.js and Tailwind CSS and Prisma connected into a MySQL Planetscale DB.

name: Bikebox
description: A bike repair shop website with an Email contact system and an Admin layer to manage customers. Created with Next.js, TRPC, Tailwind CSS and MySQL using the T3 Stack.

name: Decentralized Exchange
description: Elaborated through the Dapp University Bootcamp. Uses smart contracts in Solidity to create ERC-20 tokens and to set the exchange. Uses JavaScript for the front-end, testing, and deployment of the contracts through scripts.

name: Crypto Service Marketplace
description: Elaborated through the Eincode Udemy course. Uses smart contracts to handle payments for the purchase of services.

name: Personal Portfolio
description: My personal portfolio elaborated in React with the NEXT.JS framework.
